comment.author: 18778996@N00
comment._content: George Allen "Iron" Davis (March 9, 1890 – June 4, 1961), was a professional baseball pitcher. He played all or part of four seasons in Major League Baseball from 1912 to 1915. He played for the Boston Braves and New York Highlanders. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Davis_%28pitcher%29

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I think this Davis is wearing a 1915 Athletics road uniform, like Lajoie in the next picture. Perhaps it's Bud Davis, a righty pitcher who played for the A's just that year. www.baseball-reference.com/players/d/davisbu01.shtml
